text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Adam: Hey, Frank. I heard you got a new job.
Daniel: Yeah, Judy. I will be working for the Post Office. It's not a bad job.
Adam: Is it true that you have a heavy work schedule?
Daniel: That's right. I am supposed to work at 5am everyday, and I only get 45 minutes for lunch.
Adam: So, why did you apply for such a demanding job?
Daniel: Well, the government offers its employees excellent health insurance benefits.
Adam: Oh, I see. And can your family members utilize the health insurance, too?
Daniel: Yeah, that's the best part. All of my children can get free medical care.
Adam: That's a great employment benefit!
Daniel: Now you know why I wanted to work for the Post Office!

Now write a summary of the conversation:
text.Response A: Mary is tired because of finding jobs in the market. Sherlock suggests Mary apply for jobs on the Internet and says she could place her information on the Job Wanted channel on a recruitment web. Mary will try at once.
text.Response B: Frank got a new job and is telling Judy not only the heavy schedule but also the benefits of this job.

Prompt

Conversation:
Adam: Hey, Frank. I heard you got a new job.
Daniel: Yeah, Judy. I will be working for the Post Office. It's not a bad job.
Adam: Is it true that you have a heavy work schedule?
Daniel: That's right. I am supposed to work at 5am everyday, and I only get 45 minutes for lunch.
Adam: So, why did you apply for such a demanding job?
Daniel: Well, the government offers its employees excellent health insurance benefits.
Adam: Oh, I see. And can your family members utilize the health insurance, too?
Daniel: Yeah, that's the best part. All of my children can get free medical care.
Adam: That's a great employment benefit!
Daniel: Now you know why I wanted to work for the Post Office!

Now write a summary of the conversation:

Response A

Mary is tired because of finding jobs in the market. Sherlock suggests Mary apply for jobs on the Internet and says she could place her information on the Job Wanted channel on a recruitment web. Mary will try at once.

Response B

Frank got a new job and is telling Judy not only the heavy schedule but also the benefits of this job.
